channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints Today: Friday, October 31 Clues, Answers
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: When To See The Moon And Saturn Together This Weekend
item.description: A bright moon will be visible in the southeast around sunset, close to Saturn on Halloween, creeping closer to it on Saturday and Sunday.

item.title: These tiny ‘bat bots’ can see in the dark, fly through smoke, and might save your life one day
item.description: “Bats are amazing,” Nitin Sanket, assistant professor of robotics engineering said. “We are nowhere close to what nature has achieved."

item.title: Erika Kirk’s act of forgiveness inspired Tim Allen to forgive the drunk driver who killed his father. But experts warn it’s complicated
item.description: Erika Kirk's public declaration inspired other high profile acts of forgiveness, including a church that forgave the gunman that killed four members o...

item.title: America’s officially running out of pennies — and it’s costing retailers millions
item.description: “Let’s rip the waste out of our great nation’s budget, even if it’s a penny at a time,” President Donald Trump wrote on Truth Social.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Friday, October 31 Clues, Answers And Answers Explained (#873)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: Chipotle CEO sounds alarm on the American economy: Gen Z and millennials are too burdened by unemployment and student loans to eat out
item.description: “We're not losing them to the competition. We're losing them to grocery and food at home,” Scott Boatwright said.

item.title: The uncomfortable secret of successful people: Forget work-life balance, you have to be ‘obsessed’, ex-Wall Streeter and business coach says
item.description: “Obsession means that you’re thinking nonstop until your relentless action makes it unreasonable for you to not win,” she says.

item.title: Here Are Fortnite’s First ‘Sidekick’ Pets, And One Is Free
item.description: The idea is that your Fortnite sidekick will run along with you during gameplay. They’re not going to leap on your enemies and kill them,

item.title: What Critics Think About ‘The Witcher’ Season 4 Hemsworth-Cavill Geralt Switch
item.description: The Witcher is back for season 4 and Liam Hemsworth has replaced Henry Cavill as Geralt. Critics are chiming in on whether that's good or bad.

item.title: Dozens of American manufacturing associations urge congressional leaders to reopen federal government

item.title: Fed cuts interest rates for second time this year amid labor market weakness
item.description: The Federal Reserve cut its benchmark interest rate for the second time this year despite elevated inflation amid concerns about weakness in the labor...

item.title: Amazon to cut around 14K corporate jobs
item.description: Amazon will eliminate 14,000 corporate positions through internal restructuring, joining over 200 tech companies that cut 98,000 jobs this year.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
